data.name: The Kynge's Gambit
data.detailed_description:
In Kynge's Gambit, the cards pick you

Modify your character to unlock cards based on your stats. Buy different weapons to change the style of your card attacks, increase your stats to increase their strength, each card is tied to you as a skill rather than just a card with a fixed number.

Fast paced fights

Unlike other card games, The Kynge's Gambit forces you to act fast against many enemies, having to create a strategy as fast as you can, spending skills to push back certain dangers and destroying the biggest threats as fast as possible.

Fight, Die, Improve and Repeat

Every time you die you'll get better, wiser and may unlock different improvements to change or tweak your run like new starter decks.

4 Classes

  • Disciples of the Moon: They rely on spells and magical defenses to overpower their opponents. Main stat: Dissidence
  • Lionheart Champions: These fearsome goliats rely on pure resolve by use of huge armors and recklessness to enemy attacks. Main stat: Flux
  • Holy Inquisition: The Holy Inquisition uses Miracles and holy weapons to bring their opponents back into the fold. Main stat: Faith
  • Church of the Forest: These worshipers of nature rely on brute weapons executing enemies in gruesome ways as an example to their allies. Main stat: Forte

data.short_description: A deckbuilding roguelite game with RPG elements and dungeon delving in a dark fantasy setting. Pick a class, select a style and improve upon it by leveling your stats and improving your deck. Fight, die, progress, repeat.
